data.system_settings: Windows 10 Home x64 Fall Creators Update (Build 1709)
data.actual_result: It just keeps going until you re-open the channel
data.expected_result: The song's duration should stop since the song has ended playing
data.short_description: Spotify song's duration keeps going in Discord after the song has finished playing
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a playlist in Spotify and play it - Grab a link to a song being played at the moment - Post the link to it in any channel - Stay in this channel until the song ends and observe
